Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: உழுதுண்டு வாழ்வாரே வாழ்வார்மற் றெல்லாம்தொழுதுண்டு பின்செல் பவர்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: They alone live who live by agriculture; all others lead a cringing, dependent life.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A farmer and their family are shown eating a meal they have grown themselves ('உழுதுண்டு'). They are depicted as standing tall, free, and dignified. They are the ones who 'truly live' ('வாழ்வாரே வாழ்வார்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Behind them, a long line of all other people in society ('மற்றெல்லாம்')—kings, priests, merchants—are shown.
Layered_Composition.Background: These other figures are depicted in a subservient posture, bowing respectfully ('தொழுது') to the farmer, and waiting to receive their food from the farmer's hands. They are followers, not leaders ('பின் செல்பவர்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A stark declaration of status: only farmers who live off their own tillage are truly living. All other professions are dependent followers who metaphorically worship the farmer to receive their food.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The posture is key. The farmer stands tall and independent. Everyone else, regardless of their worldly status, is in a posture of dependence and respect towards the farmer. The flow of food is one-way: from the farmer to everyone else.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A strong, noble, and independent light shines on the farmer's family. The line of followers is in a slightly dimmer, more supplicant light. The palette emphasizes the farmer's connection to the earth and their fundamental power.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that places the dignified farmer in the powerful foreground, with the long, bowing line of all other professions stretching out behind them.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a focus on the contrasting postures of independence and dependence.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Lighting that emphasizes the status and power dynamic described in the Kural.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Social realism, with a strong hierarchical composition.
